entry.title: New release for ClipCascade: ClipCascade v0.2.0
entry.content:
ðŸš€ ClipCascade v0.2.0 Release

ClipCascadeâ€”your go-to lightweight, open-source utility for seamless, secure clipboard synchronization across multiple devicesâ€”just got better. The v0.2.0 update introduces new features and improvements designed to enhance the syncing experience and provide more customization options.

What's Included:

  • Windows:
  • Installer (.msi)
  • Standalone Executable (.exe)â€”No startup option
  • Android App (.apk)
  • Linux Package(GUI) (ClipCascade_Linux.zip)
  • Linux Package(non-GUI) (ClipCascade_Linux_Terminal.zip)
  • Docker Compose (docker-compose.yml)â€”Self-hosting made easy

Key Features:

  • Cross-Platform Sync: Effortlessly sync clipboard content between Windows, Linux, and Android devices.
  • Self-Hosted Option: Host your own secure clipboard sync server using Docker.
  • Privacy-First: End-to-end encryption keeps your clipboard data secure.
  • Customizable Settings: Fine-tune performance with options for clipboard size limits, session management, and more.

What's New in v0.2.0:

Android:

  1. Automatic Clipboard Monitoring: Now includes a workaround for both rooted and non-rooted devices.
  2. Enhanced Error Messages: Clearer, more informative error reporting.
  3. Foreground Service Check: Easily verify whether the foreground service is running or stopped.
  4. Text Selection Integration: New option added to the text selection popup menu for faster access.
  5. Updated Instructions: Refined documentation for easier setup.
  6. Salt Field for Encryption: Strengthens password protection with a salt field for enhanced encryption security.

Desktop:

  1. Notification Control: Option to disable notifications for a more streamlined experience.
  2. Salt for Encryption: Added support for encryption salt, just like in the Android version.
  3. Taskbar Enhancements:
  4. Hover over the taskbar icon to see the appâ€™s title.
  5. Direct link to the GitHub repository added for easy access to updates and issues.
  6. Linux:
    • Terminal-Based Implementation: New non-GUI version allows users to run ClipCascade directly from the terminal for easier management and automation.

Enjoy a smoother, more customizable clipboard syncing experience with ClipCascade v0.2.0!

entry.title: New release for ClipCascade: ClipCascade v1.0.0
entry.content:
ðŸš€ ClipCascade v1.0.0 Release

ClipCascade has officially reached its v1.0.0 milestone, delivering a more polished, feature-complete experience for users seeking seamless, secure clipboard synchronization across devices. This release includes all updates from previous versions, enhanced stability, optimized performance, and several highly requested featuresâ€”now including macOS support!

ðŸ“¥ Available Downloads:

| Platform | File Name | |-----------------------|----------------------| | Windows | Installer (ClipCascade.msi), Standalone Executable (ClipCascade.exe)â€”No startup option | | macOS | ARM M-Series (ClipCascade-Apple_macOS(ARM_M-Series).zip), Intel (ClipCascade-Apple_macOS(Intel-Series).zip) | | Android | ClipCascade.apk | | Linux (GUI) | ClipCascade_Linux.zip | | Linux (Non-GUI) | ClipCascade_Linux_Terminal.zip | | Docker | docker-compose.yml |

ðŸ”‘ Key Features:

  • Cross-Platform Sync: Sync clipboard content seamlessly across Windows, macOS, Linux, and Android devices.
  • Self-Hosted Option: Host a private clipboard sync server using Docker, prioritizing privacy and data control.
  • End-to-End Encryption: Keeps your clipboard data secure across every device.
  • Enhanced Customization: Control clipboard size limits, encryption salt, and the number of hash rounds for improved security.

âœ¨ What's New in v1.0.0:

macOS:

  • Full macOS Integration: Enjoy a fully optimized ClipCascade experience on macOS with seamless clipboard access, notifications, and native support.

Windows, Linux (GUI and Non-GUI) and Android:

  1. Error Messages Update: Error messages have been updated for better clarity and troubleshooting.
  2. Heartbeat Enabled: Periodic heartbeat signals ensure the connection remains active, preventing interruptions in clipboard syncing.
  3. Login Form Update: Blank spaces in the login form are now automatically trimmed, improving the UI layout.

Server:

  1. Heartbeat Enabled: The server now sends heartbeat signals to keep connections alive, ensuring stable and continuous syncing.
